name: Mancala: Board Game
description:
Mancala, one of the oldest African traditional indoor games, is available for your mobile.

Get this classic Mancala game along with exclusive Online Multiplayer feature to play with your friends.

Mancala rule is simple. Collect maximum beans in your Mancala than your opponent to win the game.
Mancala will improve your fun experience via available exciting boards. Mancala is available with very interactive self-learning tutorials. You can learn the best strategies via mini games.
This game is also famous by the name of “Congkak”, “Sowing”.

Features:
• Play with your friend residing anywhere in the world. Offline two player mode is also available.
• Beautiful boards to play with!
• Interactive Tutorials
• Study different strategies.
• Multiple difficulty levels - For beginners to novices.
• Easy to use interface
